name: uberloop
tag_list: social-network, social-media, consumer-engagement, email-marketing, mobile, rewards, local, online-marketing
overview:
uberloop is your local social network. With uberloop, you can discover new businesses, find local deals, earn valuable rewards, and connect & share with friends.

Businesses use uberloop to simplify and consolidate their marketing and social communications, while creating more awareness of their business to local customers.

uberloop combines the best of local social networking, email, mobile, deals, rewards, and relationship marketing into one comprehensive platform.

Businesses can use uberloop’s social media dashboard to post their news, announcements, events, and social communications to every member within a 30-mile radius of their business, in addition to Facebook, Twitter, and Linkedin. Business members can also create and manage deals for their busniess in less than that two minutes and socially share them throughout uberloop’s local network and on Facebook, Twitter, and Linkedin.

And, uberloop businesses can utilize the power of email and invitation-based marketing to reward their customers for connecting with their business in uberloop. Through these email invitations, businesses can cross-promote their business with other local businesses and encourage their customers to fully engage their business within their uberloop Community.
